title: Episode 229: The Tragic Death of Natalie Wood
description:
Natalie Wood had one of the most troubling back stories a child star could have, a stage mom that crossed all imaginable boundaries, a violent alcoholic for a father and men that took advantage of her all throughout her life. She thought she had found safety in Robert Wagner, who she was married to twice. But the events on the final night of her life leave some with questions about Robert Wagner… did he push his beloved wife overboard?

Book mentioned in episode:
Natasha: The Biography of Natalie Wood by Suzanne Finstad
